About Us

Satire, Laughs, Giggles and all seriousness

Have you ever been cruelly robbed of a good ol' giggle? Stripped of your right to chortle without fear? Perhaps you teeter dangerously on the edge of being offensive—or worse, rude.

Well, worry no more! The Daily Satire, founded in 2019, exists solely to provide you with budget-friendly smirks, discount chuckles, and wholesale belly laughs—all at your expense, of course.

But be warned: Do not attempt these stunts alone. Many animals perished in the making of this news empire. In fact, we choke a chicken every time you refresh this page—scientifically proven to make news travel faster.

We believe in free speech—your absolute, unquestionable, divinely ordained right to say whatever you want, whenever you want, to whomever you want. We don't have to like it. We don't even have to agree. But rest assured, we will fight for your right to be insufferable.

And finally, in our tireless quest to fight modern outrage culture, we've implemented a bold initiative: For every "I'm offended" uttered on the news, The Daily Satire will donate 5 euros to the Donald Trump 2024 campaign. You're welcome.
